title: 各位喜欢RPG服务器吗
author: 阿黎Nya
txt_content:
我个人是比较喜欢RPG服务器的
最近又入坑了一个
每天在线10h+
肝帝不断冲冲冲！

replies.author: BlackCF
replies.txt_content: RPG还真没玩过，还不如玩个网游~

replies.author: 梦江南
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: qianms
replies.txt_content: RPG+MCMMO我超爱

replies.author: AzZ、迷失
replies.txt_content: RPG服务器还可以吧

replies.author: irocksir
replies.txt_content:
RPG没有肝还真玩不下去，进服被肝帝氪佬各种秀。
个人感觉还是生存啥的更舒服一点

replies.author: wsldd_2
replies.txt_content: 玩，不过比较喜欢玩那种材质好的rpg

replies.author: BigKillBla
replies.txt_content: 肯定喜欢 我也是10h+的一个肝帝！

replies.author: 062desu
replies.txt_content: 喜欢玩纯净的rpg

replies.author: 低热皮皮虾
replies.txt_content: rpg服务器 现在不都是 要么硬肝  要么就氪

replies.author: xia_chen
replies.txt_content: 不怎么喜欢，一直肝又不休闲。

replies.author: Mr_fengfeng
replies.txt_content: 我去steam买个有游戏玩不香吗=-=

replies.author: 丿一叶之秋
replies.txt_content: rpg服剧情还不错的会玩，或者和认识的人玩
老肝帝了呀

replies.author: caijia
replies.txt_content: 喜欢玩RPG，也可以肝

replies.author: cok473
replies.txt_content: 盘灵古域我吹爆

replies.author: MC遗忘
replies.txt_content: 不怎么玩，但挺喜欢rpg的

replies.author: aweidada
replies.txt_content: 我只喜欢纯净生存

replies.author: 卡bug
replies.txt_content: 很喜欢那种满图跑刷怪的服务器

replies.author: ArThur_Morgan_
replies.txt_content: 喜欢玩RPG服吗？要不要给你介绍一个？https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-1102039-1-1.html

replies.author: 烧麦_
replies.txt_content: 好玩是好玩就是废肝

replies.author: 林_玖
replies.txt_content: 还可以，就是肝，
